text: Cyclo ( ) is a 1995 Vietnamese-Hong Kong-French crime drama movie directed by Tran Anh Hung and starring Lê Văn Lộc, Tony Leung Chiu Wai, Trần Nữ Yên Khê, Nguyen Nhu Quynh. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1995 crime drama movies Category:Vietnamese movies Category:Hong Kong crime movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Tran Anh Hung Category:Movies set in Vietnam
title: Cyclo (movie)
